experience: You and David both know Dr. Ernie Prabhakar, Michael McMillion, and 10 others
• Help to manage DNS @ Apple both internal and external• Created and built internal web applications/tools for managing and maintaining DNS, using Go, PHP, MySQL, Perl, JavaScript, & Shell scripting

• Build and maintain large scale internal web applications to handle both assets and deliverables across many departments• Performance testing/improvements for both client side and database driven applications to create a better user experience• Created and built internal web applications for project & process management, using Ruby on Rails, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, &Shell scripting• Build, upgrade, and manage servers and VMs for hosting and deploying web applications

•	Managed a software development team that varied from 4 to 8 people for creating internal tools for project & process management•	Managed multiple, concurrent software projects in multiple programming languages, including hiring and building the teams•	Helped to move the software development process to a more agile process, while continuing to deliver features and improvements

•	Developed and maintained a number of large scale web applications•	Design and development of a CMS and deployment tool for building out large websites in multiple languages•	Performance testing/improvements for both client side and database driven applications

•	Managed the manufacturing process from design to finished product for 10 - 15 different hardward/software products•	Managed product design, purchasing, all PCB manufacturing and assembly, product testing/revisions, and packaging design
recommendations: Dave worked for me for most of my 4 years at Apple, and was technical lead on every project we did, including some high-profile projects at major mktg events.  He delivered consistently excellent results.  Dave’s a very talented developer, with an innate ability to find the best way to get anything done.  That’s partly because he is adept at a dozen different technologies, but also because he has a very low-key, likable personality and can manage people in his org and beyond to deliver results.  Highest recommendation, with zero qualifications — I’d hire him again in a heartbeat if I ever get the chance.
